item.description: Starting April 17th (and hopefully continuing each and every Wednesday in perpetuity), there will be KARAOKE from 8PM until "sometime later" at the one and only Anastasia's Italian Steakhouse in East Haven by the beach. A warm and inviting place with spectacular food, libations and accommodating staff, Anastasia's will be a great place to get over your "Hump Day" with songs and hopefully some laughs (God knows we all can use some of that these days!) So come on in and join your friends and family for a great night out and sing your hearts out. See (and hear) you all there....

group.name: Karaoke Lovers of Greater New Haven .

item.name: Hump Day Karaoke at Anastasia's in East Haven
